steps.description: Talk to Innkeeper Anderson and set your Hearthstone to Southshore
Talk to Darla Harris and fly to Western Plaguelands
Travel towards Lieutenant Haggerdin in Alterac Mountains
Talk to Lieutenant Haggerdin and turn in The Sovereign Imperative
Travel to Western Plaguelands
Talk to Commander Ashlam Valorfist and accept The Scourge Cauldrons and All Along the Watchtowers
Talk to Argent Officer Pureheart and turn in The Everlook Report
Talk to High Priestess MacDonnell, turn in The Scourge Cauldrons, and accept Target: Felstone Field
Talk to Nathaniel Dumah and accept A Plague Upon Thee
Talk to Flint Shadowmore, turn in Flint Shadowmore, and accept The Eastern Plagues
Equip the Argent Dawn Commission to start collecting Scourgestones
Kill Cauldron Lord Bilemaw. Loot him for the Felstone Field Cauldron Key

tips.text: Cauldron Lord Bilemaw may spawn as you approach the Cauldron

steps.description: Click on the Scourge Cauldron, turn in Target: Felstone Field, and accept Return to Chillwind Camp
Go inside the house
Talk to Janice Felstone up stairs and accept Better Late Than Never
Exit the house and go inside the barn
Click Janice's Parcel on the ground, turn in Better Late Than Never, and accept Better Late Than Never

tips.text: This has a 5 second cast time
You can do this from behind the wall to avoid aggroing anything inside
Avoid aggroing the Scarlets outside the barn. If you do, run away

steps.description: Travel to Chillwind Camp
Talk to High Priestess MacDonnell, turn in Return to Chillwind Camp, and accept Target: Dalson's Tears
Use the Beacon Torch next to the Tower entrance. You can do this without agroing the Elite Skeletal Warlord inside
Talk to Mulgris Deepriver and accept The Wildlife Suffers Too

tips.text: Freezing Ghouls cast Flash Freeze. This ability stuns for 5 seconds. Avoid agroing multiple at the same time at all costs

steps.description: Kill Diseased Wolves

tips.text: Diseased Wolves share spawns with Carrion Lurkers. You may need to kill them to force Diseased Wolves to spawn

steps.description: Enter the Dalson's Tears Barn. Click Mrs. Dalson's Diary on the ground and accept Mrs. Dalson Diary. Turn in Mrs. Dalson Diary
Kill the Wandering Skeleton. Loot it for the Dalson Outhouse Key

tips.text: The Wandering Skeleton patrols around the Dalson's Tear Barn and House

steps.description: Click the Outhouse to summon Farmer Dalson and turn in Locked Away
Kill Farmer Dalson. Loot him for the Dalson Cabinet Key
Click the Locked Cabinet up stairs in the house and turn in Locked Away
Kill Cauldron Lord Malvinious. Loot him for the Dalson's Tears Cauldron Key

tips.text: Cauldron Lord Malvinious may spawn as you approach the Cauldron

steps.description: Click on the Scourge Cauldron, turn in Target: Dalson's Tears, and accept Return to Chillwind Camp
Kill Diseased Wolves

tips.text: Diseased Wolves share spawns with Carrion Lurkers. You may need to kill them to force Diseased Wolves to spawn

steps.description: Use the Beacon Torch next to the Tower entrance. You can do this without agroing the Elite Skeletal Warlord inside
Use the Beacon Torch next to the Tower entrance. You can do this without agroing the Elite Skeletal Warlord inside
Use the Beacon Torch next to the Tower entrance. You can do this without agroing the Elite Skeletal Warlord inside
Travel to Chillwind Camp
Talk to Commander Ashlam Valorfist, turn in All Along the Watchtowers, and accept Scholomance
Talk to Alchemist Arbington and turn in Scholomance
Talk to High Priestess MacDonnell, turn in Return to Chillwind Camp, and accept Target: Writhing Haunt
Delete the Beacon Torch
Kill Cauldron Lord Razarch. Loot him for the Writhing Haunt Cauldron Key

tips.text: Cauldron Lord Razarch may spawn as you approach the Cauldron
Freezing Ghouls cast Flash Freeze. This ability stuns for 5 seconds. Avoid agroing multiple at the same time at all costs

steps.description: Click on the Scourge Cauldron, turn in Target: Writhing Haunt, and accept Return to Chillwind Camp
Talk to Mulgris Deepriver, turn in The Wildlife Suffers Too, and accept The Wildlife Suffers Too

tips.text: Freezing Ghouls cast Flash Freeze. This ability stuns for 5 seconds. Avoid agroing multiple at the same time at all costs

steps.description: Kill any Diseased Grizzlies you see en-route to Eastern Plaguelands

tips.text: It is important you kill any you see along the way, but you don't have to complete it now

steps.description: Travel to Eastern Plaguelands
Talk to Tirion Fordring and accept Demon Dogs, Blood Tinged Skies, and Carrion Grubbage
Kill Plaguebats, Plaguehound Runts, and Carrion Grubs. Loot them for their Worm Meat
Click the Mangled Human Remains on the ground. Loot it for the SI:7 Insignia (Fredo)
Click the Mangled Human Remains on the ground. Loot it for the SI:7 Insignia (Turyen)
Click the Mangled Human Remains on the ground. Loot it for the SI:7 Insignia (Rutger)
Talk to Pamela Redpath, turn in Sister Pamela, and accept Pamela's Doll
Loot Pamela's Doll's Head, Pamela's Doll's Left Side and Pamela's Doll's Right Side throughout the buildings

tips.text: They all spawn randomly in any of the 3 buildings in Darrowshire

steps.description: Use Pamela's Doll's Head, Pamela's Doll's Left Side or Pamela's Doll's Right Side to combine them into Pamela's Doll
Talk to Pamela Redpath, turn in Pamela's Doll, and accept Auntie Marlene and Uncle Carlin
Kill Plaguebats, Plaguehound Runts and Plaguehounds, and Carrion Grubs. Loot them for their Worm Meat
Talk to Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff and turn in Duke Nicholas Zverenhoff
Talk to Carlin Redpath, turn in Uncle Carlin, and accept Defenders of Darrowshire
Talk to Smokey LaRue, accept That's Asking A Lot, and turn in That's Asking A Lot
Talk to Khaelyn Steelwing and get the Light's Hope Chapel flight path
Talk to Caretaker Alen and accept The Restless Souls and Zaeldarr the Outcast
Kill Diseased Flayers, Gibbering Ghouls and Cannibal Ghouls. Talk to the Darrowshire Spirits that spawn from their corpses
Kill Frenzied Plaguehounds
Open the Large Termite Mounds throughout Plaguewood. Loot them for the Plagueland Termites
Talk to Egan and turn in The Restless Souls
Kill Diseased Flayers, Gibbering Ghouls and Cannibal Ghouls. Talk to the Darrowshire Spirits that spawn from their corpses
Talk to Carlin Redpath and turn in Defenders of Darrowshire
Talk to Tirion Fordring, turn in Demon Dogs, Blood Tinged Skies, and Carrion Grubbage, and accept Redemption
Talk to Tirion Fordring
Talk to Tirion Fordring and turn in Redemption
Talk to Tirion Fordring and accept Of Forgotten Memories
Enter The Undercroft crypt
Kill Zaeldarr the Outcast. Loot him for his Head
Click the Torn Scroll on the ground and accept Hameya's Plea
Click the Loose Dirt Mound to summon Mercutio Filthgorger and 3 additional Crypt Robbers
Kill Mercutio Filthgorger. Loot him for Taelan's Hammer
Talk to Tirion Fordring, turn in Of Forgotten Memories, and accept Of Lost Honor
Talk to Tirion Fordring and accept Of Lost Honor
Abandon Of Forgotten Memories
Hearth to Southshore
Talk to Darla Harris and fly to Western Plaguelands
Talk to High Priestess MacDonnell, turn in Return to Chillwind Camp, and accept Target: Gahrron's Withering
Talk to Nathaniel Dumah, turn in A Plague Upon Thee, and accept A Plague Upon Thee
Talk to Flint Shadowmore, turn in The Eastern Plagues, and accept The Blightcaller Cometh
Talk to Alchemist Arbington and accept Skeletal Fragments
Delete any left over Plagueland Termites
Talk to Marlene Redpath, turn in Auntie Marlene, and accept A Strange Historian

tips.text: Marlene Redpath may also be upstairs

steps.description: Click Joseph Redpath's Monument. Loot it for Joseph's Wedding Ring
Kill Skeletal Executioners and Skeletal Acolytes. Loot them for their Skeletal Fragments
Talk to Chromie upstairs, turn in A Strange Historian, and accept The Annals of Darrowshire
Talk to Chromie upstairs, turn in A Strange Historian, and accept The Annals of Darrowshire and A Matter of Time
Enter the Ruins of Andorhal Town Hall

tips.text: Click here for video reference on how to enter the Town Hall safely

steps.description: Enter the Ruins of Andorhal Town Hall. Open the Musty Tomes. Loot them for the Annals of Darrowshire

tips.text: The correct Musty Tome will have its pages be a completely dark-shade, or have a brown stain. If it's only half white and half black, that is a trap
There can be times where all Musty Tomes are traps and you must open them to force a correct one to spawn
Click here for video reference on how to identify the correct Musty Tome

steps.description: Kill Temporal Parasites

tips.text: Use the Temporal Displacer at the silos to make them spawn. If the silo isn't pulsing blue then it cannot spawn any Temporal Parasites
Multiple Temporal Parasites can spawn at the same time, and once one dies, another one can instantly spawn

steps.description: Talk to Chromie upstairs, turn in A Matter of Time, accept Counting Out Time, turn in The Annals of Darrowshire, and accept Brother Carlin
Talk to Chromie upstairs, accept Counting Out Time, turn in The Annals of Darrowshire, and accept Brother Carlin
Talk to Chromie upstairs, turn in The Annals of Darrowshire, and accept Brother Carlin
Abandon A Matter of Time
Open the Small Lockboxes. Loot them for Andorhal Watches

tips.text: These are found inside of the burnt-down houses

steps.description: Talk to Chromie and turn in Counting Out Time
Kill Skeletal Executioners and Skeletal Acolytes. Loot them for their Skeletal Fragments
Talk to Alchemist Arbington and turn in Skeletal Fragments
Talk to Bibilfaz Featherwhistle and fly to Eastern Plaguelands
Talk to Carlin Redpath, turn in Brother Carlin, and accept Villains of Darrowshire
Talk to Carlin Redpath and accept Heroes of Darrowshire
Talk to Caretaker Alen and turn in Zaeldarr the Outcast
Loot the Symbol of Lost Honor underwater
Kill Infiltrator Hameya. Loot him for Hameya's Key

tips.text: Mossflayer Scouts will run away and call for help as soon as you agro them
Infiltrator Hameya patrols around the graves of Zul'Mashar

steps.description: Loot the Skull of Horgus underwater
Loot the Shattered Sword of Marduk on the ground
Click the Mound of Dirt and turn in Hameya's Plea
Abandon Hameya's Plea
Talk to Tirion Fordring, turn in Of Lost Honor, and accept Of Love and Family
Kill Diseased Grizzlies

tips.text: Diseased Grizzlies share spawns with Plague Lurkers. You may need to kill them to force Diseased Grizzlies to spawn

steps.description: Loot Redpath's Shield on the ground

tips.text: The other objective of this quest requires going into Hearthglen. If you are not comfortable going into Hearthglen with a group later, skip this step now and abandon Heroes of Darrowshire

steps.description: Kill Cauldron Lord Soulwrath. Loot him for the Gahrron's Withering Cauldron Key

tips.text: Cauldron Lord Soulwrath may spawn as you approach the Cauldron

steps.description: Click on the Scourge Cauldron, turn in Target: Gahrron's Withering, and accept Return to Chillwind Camp
Kill Diseased Grizzlies

tips.text: Diseased Grizzlies share spawns with Plague Lurkers. You may need to kill them to force Diseased Grizzlies to spawn

steps.description: Talk to Mulgris Deepriver, turn in The Wildlife Suffers Too, and accept Glyphed Oaken Branch

tips.text: Freezing Ghouls cast Flash Freeze. This ability stuns for 5 seconds. Avoid agroing multiple at the same time at all costs

steps.description: Travel to Caer Darrow
Talk to Artist Renfray and turn in Of Love and Family
Click on the Northridge Lumber Mill Crate to place the Termite Barrel and then click on the Termite Barrel after, turn in A Plague Upon Thee, and accept A Plague Upon Thee
Talk to Kirsta Deepshadow and accept Unfinished Business
Kill Scarlet Medics, Scarlet Hunters, Scarlet Mages and Scarlet Knights

tips.text: Scarlet Medics and Scarlet Hunters share spawns
Scarlet Mages and Scarlet Knights share spawns

steps.description: Talk to Kirsta Deepshadow, turn in Unfinished Business, and accept Unfinished Business
Kill Huntsman Radley
Kill Cavalier Durgen

tips.text: Cavalier Durgen will patrol up and down the Tower. Wait at the bottom for him to come to you instead of going inside

steps.description: Talk to Kirsta Deepshadow, turn in Unfinished Business, and accept Unfinished Business
Travel to Hearthglen
Ascend the Hearthglen Tower

tips.text: You may either run straight to the top and jump down or clear your way up
Avoid High Protector Lorik who is a strong Elite that roams Hearthglen
This quest can be difficult. Skip it if you are not confident going into Hearthglen
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Loot Davil's Libram on the table

tips.text: Avoid High Protector Lorik who is a strong Elite that roams Hearthglen
This quest can be difficult. Skip it if you are not confident going into Hearthglen

steps.description: Talk to Kirsta Deepshadow and turn in Unfinished Business
Abandon Unfinished Business
Hearth to Southshore
Talk to Darla Harris and fly to Western Plaguelands
Talk to High Priestess MacDonnell and turn in Return to Chillwind Camp
Talk to Commander Ashlam Valorfist, accept Mission Accomplished!, and turn in Mission Accomplished!
Talk to Nathaniel Dumah and turn in A Plague Upon Thee
Talk to Commander Ashlam Valorfist and accept Forging the Mightstone
Talk to Bibilfaz Featherwhistle and fly to Eastern Plaguelands
Talk to Carlin Redpath and turn in Villains of Darrowshire and Heroes of Darrowshire
Talk to Carlin Redpath and turn in Villains of Darrowshire
If you bought Dark Iron Scraps / Core of Elements / Crypt Fiend Parts / Bone Fragments / Savage Fronds take them out of your mail. If you did not buy any, skip this step
If you do not have the Reputation required to accept these quests, grind on nearby Undead until you are Friendly with the Argent Dawn
Talk to Rayne, accept Savage Flora, and turn in Savage Flora
Talk to Huntsman Leopold, accept Cryptstalker Armor Doesn't Make Itself..., and turn in Cryptstalker Armor Doesn't Make Itself...
Talk to Rohan the Assassin, accept Bonescythe Digs, and turn in Bonescythe Digs
Talk to Archmage Angela Dosantos, accept The Elemental Equation, and turn in The Elemental Equation
Talk to Korfax, accept Binding the Dreadnaught, and turn in Binding the Dreadnaught
Talk to Smokey LaRue, accept That's Asking A Lot, and turn in That's Asking A Lot
Abandon Heroes of Darrowshire
Teleport to Stormwind City
Talk to Jennea and train your class spells
Talk to Khaelyn Steelwing and fly to Stormwind
You will now fly around and pickup quests for Sunken Temple. Start looking for a group to run Sunken Temple

tips.text: You still need to complete 2 quests in Blasted Lands to unlock you class quests soon. 1 of them requires killing 50 mobs

steps.description: Talk to Khaelyn Steelwing and fly to Hinterlands
Talk to the Atal'ai Exile and accept Jammal'an the Prophet
Talk to Guthrum Thunderfist and fly to Wetlands
Take the boat to Theramore
Talk to Baldruc and fly to Tanaris
Talk to Marvon Rivetseeker and accept Into the Depths and Secret of the Circle
Talk to Yeh'kinya and accept The God Hakkar
Teleport to Stormwind City
Talk to Jennea and train your class spells
Talk to Bera Stonehammer and fly to Ratchet
Take the Boat to Booty Bay
Talk to Gyll and fly to Stormwind
Talk to Brohann Caskbelly and accept Into The Temple of Atal'Hakkar
Travel toward Royal Factor Bathrilor upstairs
Talk to Royal Factor Bathrilor inside on the 2nd floor, turn in Better Late Than Never, and accept Good Natured Emma
Talk to Ol' Emma either inside her home on the 2nd floor, or patrolling the Trade District and turn in Good Natured Emma

tips.text: Skip the follow up as you won't return to WPL before hitting 60

steps.description: Talk to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon and turn in The Blightcaller Cometh
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to Arthur the Faithful and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Joshua and train your class spells
Talk to Wu or Ilsa and train your class spells
Talk to Osborne and train your class spells
Talk to Einris Brightspear and train your class spells
Go into The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Spackle Thornberry. Buy Grimoires for your pets
You will now run Sunken Temple. Continue to look for a group if you need. You may fly to Blasted Lands and grind mobs there while you form a group
Continue to look for a Sunken Temple group if needed while you fly and complete you 2 class quests in Blasted Lands
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Blasted Lands
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Blasted Lands
Talk to the Fallen Hero of the Horde and accept Warrior Kinship
Kill Helboars
Talk to the Fallen Hero of the Horde, turn in Warrior Kinship, and accept War on the Shadowsworn
Kill Shadowsworn Adepts, Shadowsworn Cultists and Shadowsworn Thugs
Talk to the Fallen Hero of the Horde and turn in War on the Shadowsworn
Talk to Alexandra Constantine and fly to Booty Bay
Talk to the Fallen Hero of the Horde and accept Voodoo Feathers
Travel to Sunken Temple
Loot the Atal'ai Tablets on the ground

tips.text: These can be looted en-route to the instance portal, as well as inside Sunken Temple

steps.description: Zone into Sunken Temple
Loot the Atal'ai Tablets on the ground
Kill Atal'alarion. Loot him for the Putrid Vine

tips.text: Atal'alarion is on the lower level of Sunken Temple and is summoned by clicking all Atal'ai Statues on the platforms

steps.description: Click on the Altar of Hakkar and turn in Into the Depths

tips.text: The Altar of Hakkar is located on the lower level of Sunken Temple

steps.description: Click on the Idol of Hakkar and turn in Secret of the Circle

tips.text: Clicking all of the Atal'ai Statues on the platforms will activate the Idol of Hakkar
The Idol of Hakkar is located on the lower level of Sunken Temple

steps.description: Click on the Altar of Hakkar and turn in Into the Depths

tips.text: The Altar of Hakkar is located on the lower level of Sunken Temple

steps.description: Kill Atal'alarion. Loot him for the Putrid Vine

tips.text: Atal'alarion is on the lower level of Sunken Temple and is summoned by clicking all Atal'ai Statues on the platforms

steps.description: Kill Gasher and Zul'Lor. Loot them for their Amber Voodoo Feathers. Kill Mijan and Hukku. Loot them for their Blue Voodoo Feathers. Kill Zolo and Loro. Loot them for their Green Voodoo Feathers

tips.text: This quest is completed on the upper level of Sunken Temple

steps.description: Use the Egg of Hakkar while next to the Dragonflayer Skeleton, then complete the event. Kill the minions of Hakkar until the Avatar of Hakkar joins. Kill the Avatar of Hakkar. Loot it for the Essence of Hakkar. Use the Essence of Hakkar to fill the Egg of Hakkar
Kill Jammal'an the Prophet. Loot him for his Head

tips.text: You must kill the 6 Trolls on the upper platforms to gain access to Jammal'an the Prophet

steps.description: Kill Morphaz. Loot it for the Tooth of Morphaz
Kill Morphaz. Loot it for the Arcane Shard
Kill Morphaz. Loot it for the Blood of Morphaz
Kill Morphaz. Loot it for the Azure Key
Kill the Shade of Eranikus. Loot him for the Essence of Eranikus. Use the Essence of Eranikus to start the quest

tips.text: Ensure you have killed all Dragonkin mobs on the upper level before engaging the Shade of Eranikus otherwise they will all aggro onto you

steps.description: Click the Essence Font and turn in The Essence of Eranikus
Talk to the Fallen Hero of the Horde and turn in Voodoo Feathers

tips.text: It is strongly advised you choose the Diamond Flask as your reward. Although the other rewards are also very good, you will not ever replace the Diamond Flask

steps.description: Travel to Stormwind
Talk to Alexandra Constantine and fly to Stormwind
Talk to Brohann Caskbelly and turn in Into The Temple of Atal'Hakkar
Hearth to Southshore
Travel to Ravenholdt Manor
Talk to Lord Jorach Ravenholdt upstairs and turn in The Azure Key
Travel to The Hinterlands
Talk to Darla Harris and fly to Hinterlands
Talk to the Atal'ai Exile and turn in Jammal'an the Prophet
Talk to Guthrum Thunderfist and fly to Booty Bay
Talk to Guthrum Thunderfist and fly to Western Plaguelands
Talk to Commander Ashlam Valorfist and turn in Forging the Mightstone
Talk to Bibilfaz Featherwhistle and fly to Booty Bay
Teleport to Darnassus
Talk to Mathrengyl Bearwalker and turn in Glyphed Oaken Branch
Take the purple portal to Rut'theran Village
Talk to Erelas Ambersky and turn in Moontouched Wildkin
Talk to Vesprystus and fly to Azshara
Cast Teleport: Moonglade
Talk to Loganaar and train your class spells
Talk to Rabine Saturna and turn in Rabine Saturna
Talk to Sindrayl and fly to Azshara
Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Booty Bay
Take the Boat to Ratchet
